root: ^The homework our teacher gave us is really hard. How do I handle it?
^Spend a lot of hours on this homework, but solve it
^Flirt with the class nerd to cheat off him
^Don't do this homework and try my luck
^Pretend to be sick to wave this task

res1: ^Our teacher was ill that day and didn't check it anyways. It was a complete waste of time!
^Our teacher gave us a really hard homework. I did it all, but the teacher was sick that day and didn't check it anyways. It was a total waste of time.
res2: ^Our teacher was ill that day and didn't check it anyways. That dork keeps trailing me, how do I lose him?

^Our teacher gave us a really hard homework. I flirted with the class nerd and he did the task for me.But the teacher was sick that day and didn't check it anyways. I wonder how I can lose the dork now.
res3: ^Bingo! I was so lucky our teacher was sick that day and didn't check it anyways
^Our teacher gave us a really hard homework. I decided to try my luck and not to do it. And I was lucky cuz the teacher got sick and didn't check it.
res4: ^I tried for nothing, as, unlike me, the teacher really got sick and didn't check it anyways
^Our teacher gave us a really hard homework. I pretended to be ill in order not to do the task. But I tried for nothing cuz the teacher got sick and didn't check it anyways.
